title: Way of Kings
text: Journey before destination. Strength before weakness. Life before death.

title: Words of Radiance
text: Honor is dead. But I'll see what I can do.

title: Oathbringer
text: To love the journey is to accept no such end. I have found, through painful experience, that the most important step a person can take is always the next one.

title: Rhythm of War
text: This is life, and I will not lie by saying every day will be sunshine. But there will be sunshine again, and that is a very different thing to say. That is truth.
